dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5119 IH: Protect Small Business and Prevent Illicit Financial Activity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Nunn of Iowa (for himself and Mrs. Beatty) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide small businesses with additional time to file beneficial ownership information, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protect Small Business and Prevent Illicit Financial Activity Act.

section.header: Beneficial ownership information reporting deadlines for small businesses
section.text: Section 5336(b)(1) of title 31, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting (but which may not adjust the report submission deadline) after Treasury; and
by striking in a timely manner, and;
by inserting (but which may not adjust the report submission deadline) after Treasury; and
by striking at the time of and inserting not later than 90 days after the date of such;
by inserting (but which may not adjust the report submission deadline) after Treasury; and
by striking in a timely manner, and not later than 1 year and inserting not later than 90 days; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: FinCEN may not by rule, guidance, or otherwise, permit any reporting company from submitting a report relating to the inability of the reporting company to obtain or identify information in the alternative to submitting a report required under this subsection.
